Label: Purpose
License: To provide URI links to specific, known licenses.

Label: Entry Guidelines
License: Enter a license URI. Recommended sources are [Creative Commons](https://creativecommons.org/) or [Open Data Commons](https://opendatacommons.org/).

Label: Commentary
License: This field is only for URIs of known licenses. Do not enter a rightsstatement.org statement here, because those belong in the [Rights](../ogm-aardvark/#rights_1) field.
